page.title: 13Shopping
page.content: As there are no shops in our area everyone has to travel for all their requirements. The{bus services}on the edge of the area are all through routes and do not serve the residents. All the people we spoke to used private cars to shop.Mr.Mills in Rowlands Lane makes a trip to Tesco every Wednesday.Most of the shopping was done in Ryde or at Tesco. Some of the residents grow their own vegetables including the Aylmers at Nunwell. Nunwell also has a cafe for the visitors and food for this is mainly delivered.Some of the cakes made for the cafe are eaten by the Aylmers. Sometimes there would be the need for a visit to Newport and on very special occasions the better off families would make a shopping expedition to the mainland.
